title: Can we have an improvement? (If you want to)

title: These talented people inspire me so much!
text: If Simmon had not created the shows with so many talented people in the world, I would not have been as inspired as I have been. These shows brings that kind of happiness in peoples hearts and souls and that‚Äôs love. This is the way the world should be. We should love one another and love our planet so that our children and their children can have a future and I just don‚Äôt want to see everything that I‚Äôve put into and creating this awesome children‚Äôs book that has all 71 illustrations I‚Äôve done hands on, just to see all I and other artists and musicians have created, just to see climate change take all this away from us! Thanks for the shows and I pray we all can fix our planet from Climate Change before it is to late!!! Thanks for reading my input!!

title: Comment Section
text: The previous version for the comment section was so much more practical in my opinion. Easier. Quicker. To the point. Also, the recommendation videos are bigger now. I believe the smaller thumbnails were more effective because you see a wider array of the recommendations. Another thing was the whole ‚ÄúX‚Äù to exit out of the comments‚Äîit just feels troublesome. It would be better if the comment section and video recommendations were kept all in one as it originally was instead of having to enter the comments and then having to exit. It‚Äôs too convoluted; people will probably either stop commenting as much or just not look to the recommendations. I‚Äôve read from other reviews that I‚Äôm not the only one that feels this way. Anyways that‚Äôs all; thanks for hearing me out!

title: End cards are a great evil.  You tube has changed, drastically, not grown.
text:
I still appreciate you tube, but it‚Äôs user interface has gotten wretched over the years.  üòñ
First of all, the grotesque introduction of end cards. ü§¨. You can no longer watch the end of any music video or program without end cards blocking your entire view.  The last kiss!  The last clue, words or looks, even the ending pananrama‚Ä¶ all gone for these tacky end cards.  Screw you!
2ndly, I specifically choose to turn off auto play, just so I won‚Äôt be hit with a new video or with ending adds when i need to rewind content.  They don‚Äôt care at all that I‚Äôm watching from a TV set and that an add causes the video to present as over, forcing me to watch ending adds just to rewind the last word or glance all before adds play again, and I have to try and rewind again, over and over again until I actually catch it.  I hate you, you tube.

title: I Understand, but it‚Äôs Annoying
text:
We all know by now that Google makes its money through advertisements but it‚Äôs seriously ruining the app experience for me. The ads that appear after every third video are now taller and take up more space on the screen. It‚Äôs hard enough trying to find new content through YouTube‚Äôs terrible algorithm, but now I have to battle through endless ads. 

Also, I hate that notifications from channels I‚Äôm subscribed to appear in two places. I get a notification from the ‚ÄúSubscriptions‚Äù tab AND the bell icon at the top of the screen. Why would I need two notifications for the exact same thing?

While I‚Äôm on a roll, I‚Äôd also suggest removing the upload button. I will not and completely refuse to watch shorts and that‚Äôs the only reason it‚Äôs there. Shorts are a worse version of Instagram reels which is already a worse version of tiktok. No content creator is going to upload long form content (which is why this platform was created in the first place) through their phone. Ditch it.

title: DOUBLE COMMERCIALS???
text: This new version from Dec 10, 2023 is awful for anyone over 50! The print is microscopic & it seems like your developers believe only younger people are using it! I, very disappointed & can't even watch it anymore & I watched A LOT! Thanks for ruining it! I know YT needs commercials but seriously, some of them are ads that are infomercials that are exceedingly long!! Who wants to watch a 5 minute video with a commercial that's longer than the video? There are also times there's a commercial less than 2 minutes in! There's got to be a middle ground somewhere. Play it before the video starts! I have neck pain from having to reach over to my iPad every 3-4 minutes & if you're not quick enough-you've got to wait for the 2nd to finish too! It's getting ridiculous!

title: Overall good app but there are some problems
text: I use this app very often! But of course, any good thing also has some down sides. I think that you guys should ban the people who truly deserve it. And there are TONS out there who really need to get taken down(Mainly Logan and Jake Paul) also, I think the three dots by each video should be put in a different spot. Because if I am trying to press it, it will click on the video and I will have to try to tap on it repeatedly until it finally works. For example, say you see a video from a youtuber you dislike, you try to press the three dots to get the video off of there. But when you try to press it, it clicks on the video instead. You go back and try to do it again. But it clicks on the video once again. You do this repeatedly until it finally works. This has happened to me too often. But overall, this is a really well made app.

title: settings option for rotation direction?
text: As an iPhone user, I generally have my screen orientation locked in portrait mode for general use. I love that YT allows us to swipe up/down for landscape/portrait toggling. However, I would actually prefer that the screen rotation be counter-clockwise as opposed to the default clockwise rotation. While there are many personal reasons, I think that the most persuasive argument would be that when propping up an iPhone [with a PopSocket] on a flat surface in a clockwise rotated landscape orientation, the volume buttons are placed underneath the phone, making quick volume adjustments [often for loud ad breaks] a bit more inconvenient. If possible, could you‚Ä¶ would you please give us an option for the upswipe rotation direction? Thank you for your time and consideration.

title: Glitches and bugs, and annoying features[as of Nov.3]
text:
As someone who uses this app daily, whether it‚Äôs to watch entertaining videos or listen to music here are some things that should be changed and fixed.

With the most recent update came bugs/glitches, whenever I leave the app while I‚Äôm listening to music it will cut-out then continue playing the music. I‚Äôve reset my phone and this still happens. 

A feature that was added a while ago that should be removed is the feature that hides unavailable videos in your playlist, and the only way to remove those videos is to click on the ‚ÄòDon't hide‚Äô option and then going through your playlist trying to find the video that isn‚Äôt available anymore. It‚Äôs annoying and time consuming, if a video is no longer available(it gets taken down, probated or deleted) it should just be automatically removed or it should be easier to find and remove.

title: Just needs ONE feature to be 5-stars
text: That feature? Disabling chapter skipping in settings. Unfortunately, if I‚Äôm watching an hour long video, I‚Äôm not trying to skip the whole section. Please just let me remove the double-finger double-tap and just let me watch the video without it skipping the whole thing.                                                               Edit: turns out there‚Äôs a second thing that needs to be fixed. PiP is so inconsistent. It‚Äôs really annoying, let‚Äôs say I want to watch a video while playing games on my phone, so I do the little swipe up and it works. Then I set my phone down for an hour and do other things. I come back, try to activate PiP again by swiping up the video, and.. it doesn‚Äôt work. What? It just closes the app as it was before PiP was introduced. Why? How does it not work now all of a sudden?

title: So much information
text: From paracord, to music artists, to installing a car filter, medical information and opinions. I prefer it over other platforms with so much discourse, arguing, opinions etc. I still am unclear why, if someone does not like a video, then back out of channel. Again from instrument learning, watching artists, and yes, even various types of cuisine. One site, helped positively change my diet-thank you. As RN, I try to remember surgical instruments, follow other topics of interest. Fixing car, fixing just about anything can be found. Helped diagnose a problem with my chain saw. Saw hand surgery CMC ARTHROPLASTY, I kind of knew what to expect but my medical specialties were Urology, OB-GYN, ER, community heath. Love daily medical questions. A ton of advice on sexuality and sexual issues. Prefer it over other social media platforms

title: Playlist problems

Another thing that‚Äôs been happening is that It won‚Äôt let me click the show unavailable delete videos so I can get them out of my playlist and I thought the last upstate fix that and then I get a new one and it reverted back to the first problem

title: Brian‚Äôs review re. UTUBE
text:
I think UTUBE is a great concept. Incredible actually. However , I won‚Äôt get a subscription because one: the movies mainly the most current are all choppy. They jump around as in you get half sentences. I can‚Äôt even watch them it so frustrating. Number two: I don‚Äôt like much comedy but I have always enjoyed Absolutely Fabulous and there are only a few. I also like Nikita and it will say ‚Äúfull season one‚Äù and it‚Äôs not. Why is it so difficult to go from the very first show until the end of the series. As well, the movies are also not named properly. You think you have chosen a movie and it ends up being another.

I hope UTUBE can ‚Äúget it together ‚Äú properly one day because otherwise it‚Äôs great!
Sincerely,
Brian

title: please put it back to normal.
text:
I hate the interface. I hate it so much. I regret updating the app so much, I wish I had the older version still. please put the normal mobile interface back because whatever you did to the new one is horrible.

2023 update:
the ui is annoying, unpleasant, and was needlessly reworked. there was nothing wrong with the older versions. I will never understand why big companies make these sort of decisions that actively worsen the quality of their product/platform.
then, it‚Äôs made worse with the obsession with shorts. it‚Äôs unnecessary to have a whole tab. I don‚Äôt care, I don‚Äôt want to care. it gets in the way, it makes it aggravating to be on the app as I‚Äôm constantly missing when it wasn‚Äôt there.
then there is the constant crashing. I don‚Äôt know what the issue is and why it continues to happen literally every day without fail, but it‚Äôs beyond frustrating.
on top of all of this, what is most irritating is the audacity to force updates after an arbitrary time span. updates for ui and features and tabs I don‚Äôt want and didn‚Äôt ask for with no means of getting around. if you‚Äôre going to force updates, at least have the decency to make things optional. it doesn‚Äôt excite me, it annoys me and makes me wish there was another platform which didn‚Äôt behave as carelessly as this one does.
as time goes on, I hate this app more and more. I will not miss it when I inevitably get fed up and find somewhere else to go.

title: Great app, but.....
text: I love this app, use it daily. Pay for premium... And this is where my only complaint comes in. I have had several instances over the past few months where I will be watching a video and an add will pop up. Sometimes it will take me a minute to realize it is even happening... I have my subscription linked to my Apple ID and will go to check to make sure that I do still have the subscription in my account. It‚Äôs always there.. I try to click the Subscribe to Premium option in the app and it strangely knows that I already am subscribed. It is beyond frustrating to pay for premium, have adds and get no reason as to why it is happening. The only way I have figured out how to get it working again is to use a new email address, either pay for a new month of service (again) and cancel the service on my original email address. Literally a 5 star app if it would stop giving me this enormous headache....

title: Mindless and baseless strike‚Äôs given to content creators
text: You all need to stop with all this nonsense of giving baseless strikes to your creators. Am I the Jerk channel is been given strikes to the point of it about to be taken down for ‚Äúusing copyright music‚Äù, I hate to break it to you all but they NEVER used any music for their videos. I repeat so it gets through to you guys NEVER USED MUSIC IN THEIR VIDEOS! You just believed the false reports instead of actually investigating them. If you even looked at a few of their videos, it would have all proven false! It‚Äôs sad that their channel is being taken down because of these idiotic and mindless strikes you gave them. You need to stop all of this and actually investigate these so called claims of copyright, you guys probably found someone who reposted their video that actually had copyright music. But instead of the person who reposted the original video on their channel getting the strike, you all strike the original creator of the video without a proper investigation on who is at fault.

title: Entertains/Teaches
text: Love uTube!  Learn about most anything from automotive repairs, oil testing, fixing a furnace, etc. Watch old TV shows, movies, religious content, gun/ammo reviews, historical documentaries, unreported news, suppressed data, etc.  Find old music and lyrics. Just a massive source of info. I like that you can choose video from shorts to in-depth and lengthy depending on how much time you have. But be careful; it can be an addictive time consumer. The downside is that uTube feeds you more and more of what you watch; also that there are annoying ads constantly interrupting to continually pitch the same products over and over again. I realize they monetarily support the platform but really, how about a different product. And I can absolutely do without political campaign ads. Stop beating a dead horse!

title: Please fix this issue
text: Armys worked so hard to try and reach our goal and it was unfair for you to take away 67 million views. I can guarantee you that people did not use a bot to get 67M views on this video. Please understand that BTS has a very large fan base that spreads all across the globe. We are not a small group, and we show up in numbers, especially when it comes to supporting our artists. I am completely nonplussed by your lack of supervision on the issue and even more sickened by your lack of communication not only about your ‚Äúnew streaming policy‚Äù but also by your lack of communication to the number of army who have reached out to you trying to find a reason for the deletion. I‚Äôm also appalled to see that you have done nothing to help stop antis from mass reporting the video under false child abuse claims. You have not stated whether you will give repercussions to those that falsely claimed this nor have you stated a specific reason for the deletion. This is not the first time you have done this to one of BTS‚Äôs music videos but I hope it will be the last.

title: Does Alphabet/Google//YouTube‚Ä¶
text:
(Why 3 not 5+ )Really have to keep ad placement and sell data on us?

title: Restricted mode, blocking content, ads
text: Restricted mode should be profile specific not device specific. If one device (TV) has 3 profiles on it and one is a child‚Äôs account restricted mode should be on for the child‚Äôs account only. Also if blocking channels, again on a children‚Äôs account, the channels should actually be blocked. Meaning that content can no longer be accessed. There is zero point in having a ‚Äúblock user‚Äù button if their content is still completely viewable. The content has been blocked for a reason, and should no longer show up in the algorithm or be able to be searched. I can‚Äôt believe how many ads play during some of these videos. I could be watching a 5 min video and see 10 ads. They come in at terrible times. At least let the person speaking get a whole sentence out before changing over to the ad. If I‚Äôm watching a video and come back to it later 15 seconds of the video plays and then it goes right to an ad. Play the ad before the video starts.

title: Having an issue
text:
I‚Äôve been using the YT app on iphone for years and it‚Äôs great. HOWEVER, when I upgraded it the Premium free trial, I noticed that it now makes my battery drain super fast and makes my phone run really hot. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app, using it now signed out‚Äîi listened to like 8 songs‚Äîwent from 94% to like 86%. On Premium, it drops 1% every few seconds and one song burns like 50% of the battery plus it makes my phone run very warm to the touch. Regular YT app signed out‚Äîcool as ice. Something is making this run the processor a ridiculous amount and that‚Äôs dumb because for a paid service with no ads it should use less data and less battery power in my opinion lol please fix this!!!
*Update I deleted then reinstalled the app and signed back in and it seems to be working normally now-no excessive battery drain.

title: Comment Section is HORRIBLE!!!!
text:
1. Everytime when I‚Äôm scrolling and reading the comments, when an ad pops up it automatically closes the comment section??? 

It becomes very annoying because I would have to click on the comment section to open back up again, and if there are numerous ads in a video, I would constantly have to do this which is so annoying!

2. After I read a single comment and I want to go back to the comment section, the ‚Äúreturn‚Äù button is on the left side. This is extremely annoying because most people are right handed and hold their phone with their right hand. Having the ‚Äúreturn‚Äù button located on the left side of the screen makes it very hard and inconvenient for your left thumb to reach for the left side of the page. 

Especially due to muscle memory, I constantly find myself clicking on the ‚ÄúX‚Äù on the right side which is lexit entire comment section‚Äù!!

There should be an option where we can switch the ‚Äúreturn‚Äù button to the right side of the screen, so it can be easier for right handed person!!!

3. Another problem unrelated to the comment section, when I‚Äôm at the notification page and I‚Äôm trying to see who replied/commented to me, it only displays a certain amount of notification. It won‚Äôt show anymore previous ones beyond that amount, even if it‚Äôs the notifications that I haven‚Äôt seen.

title: Amazing app
text: Morbius is a 2022 American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name, produced by Columbia Pictures in association with Marvel, Arad Productions, and Matt Tolmach Productions, and distributed by Sony Pictures Releasing. It is the third film in Sony's Spider-Man Universe (SSU). Directed by Daniel Espinosa and written by the writing team of Matt Sazama and Burk Sharpless, the film stars Jared Leto as Dr. Michael Morbius, alongside Matt Smith, Adria Arjona, Jared Harris, Al Madrigal, and Tyrese Gibson. In the film, Michael and his surrogate brother Milo (Smith) become living vampires after curing themselves of a rare blood disease.  There were previously two notable attempts to adapt the character of Michael into a cinematic form since 1998, those being a role in the Blade franchise as an antagonist and having a solo film produced by Artisan Entertainment, neither of which ever came to fruition. After announcing plans for a new shared universe of films inspired

title: A lot of ads but a good source of entertainment

title: Jumping through hoops for mundane settings
text: When it comes to video resolution, people know more is better. When it comes to bitrate, people know more is better. When it comes to any objective measure of media quality, people know more is better. When people own a device, be it a TV, a monitor, a phone, etc, the resolution is displayed as a proud badge on the box and in advertisements. So people know which resolution they have, it is advertised proudly in any screen‚Äôs box. So why on Earth is Google patronising its users by hiding the ability to choose our preferred resolution behind ‚Äúadvanced‚Äù settings? This is absurd, it adds an extra step, and we cannot be sure Google will select the maximum resolution our screens can display, since I could be watching in a 4K screen and google deciding that 720p is high enough for now. Absurd and patronising.

title: Great app

title: Addictive, you end up wasting time on it
text:
The app itself is good, there are no problems when it comes to finding ‚Äúentertainment.‚Äù There are also no problems with the mechanics as well. 

The problem that lies is how addicting it is, you end up wasting hours of your time watching videos on this app. They also seem to push harmful content on it.

I did an experiment, made a new account and only subbed to educational and self help channels. Soon enough I was being recommended drama videos and ranting videos, videos I did not want to see I was not watching on this account. 

Expanding on what I said earlier on how you end up wasting your time on this app, the best way I can describe it is that you get sucked into this app and videos on it. You may start off by watching it for fun but you soon just end up watching it, to watch it, and you can‚Äôt stop. Your not enjoying it anymore, you just watch, mindlessly. 

If you are going to use this app, I suggest you put a screen time limit on it, to prevent wasting time on it. Be careful tho, your this app‚Äôs money source, they want you to get addicted, they want you to not stop watching, to spend hours on it, since it benefits them money wise. I understand that it is nice watching this app‚Äôs videos sometimes, since some videos are helpful and beneficial to you, but you have to be aware of how much time you spend on it. 

Like I said, the app itself is good, it‚Äôs just addicting.

title: Progressively Removed Features
text:
Edit: Within a week of the change, after submitting a complaint and this review, the history section is back. While the app is perfect, the quick turnaround has me leaning far more toward 5 than 1 stars. I have left the previous review below for those curious. 

I used to love this app, a few years ago it would have gotten five stars, a few days ago 4, but I can no longer ignore the changes that make the experience worse. For an app that crashes as frequently as this one does, the Watch History page was super necessary to finish videos that were cut short by the app crashing or just needing to step away for a bit. The devs need to bring this back in some capacity, then I will correct my rating to 4 or 5 stars.

title: Why change the comments location?
text:
The new comments are extremely irritating to me, the before convenient scrolling down to the comments is gone. The new comment section is hardly noticeable under the video description, and once I scroll past all of the now large video thumbnails(I can only see about two or three at a time) I‚Äôm faced with the fact that the comments aren‚Äôt there anymore. I‚Äôm upset that the update made seeing the comments so inconvenient, I like to be able to scroll down and see the recommended videos and then read comments. It was just scrolling down, but now if I wanted to do that I‚Äôd have to scroll all the way back up to see the comments instead of having the old placement. I‚Äôm sorry if this review is repetitive or doesn‚Äôt make a lot of sense, I‚Äôm extremely tired and frustrated atm and I don‚Äôt feel like reading this over.

Overall I enjoy this app, but I believe convenience is key.

title: Gets worse and worse
text:
this app was great before the latest three or four updates. i used the app daily before those updates but when they installed the apps performance and my rating for it went downhill. cant have more than one of the same video in a playlist, thats terrible for my playlist of band music. app doesn't run properly even when on wifi after entering my own wifi zone. drains my phone and iPad battery even when there is only one video running. all in all i just think this app needs lots of help and taking off the latest three or four updates and im sure it will work perfectly and my rating will go back up. 

-EDIT
app is just terrible now i cant even do anything in my own wifi zone or any other wifi zone. service on data or in wifi is just not up to date and its like watching tv in 1965. yall really need to get your crap together and fix this freakin app cause its just terrible now.

title: Shuffle feature on playlists
text:
You had it all figured out in the last update, now it‚Äôs back to what it used to be, a useless feature...  Who in their right mind would want a shuffle portion that only shuffles the first immediate 200 videos and actually physically shuffle them not even jump to a random song while keeping the playlist intact?  That is my only issue other than making it so ads play on every video in a playlist rather than what it used to be if you kept watching you‚Äôd get less ads unless you physically chose the next song.

Edit: To make matters worse you made it so when you do shuffle and hit he next button it doesn‚Äôt send you to for example: 3261, it just goes to the song right after it.  

Having a playlist that nears 5,000 songs I would like that the playlist doesn‚Äôt physically shuffle and just skips to different parts of the playlist like how any other app‚Äôs shuffle works.

title: Too but...
text: All right I‚Äôve been using this app ever since I got this electronic but the thing is it wouldn‚Äôt let me watch videos it was always lag please fix this thing it‚Äôs really annoying even want to see my own favorite videos I cannot watch them they‚Äôre loading too long and I would really like you guys to fix this problem this is the reason why I only gave it three stars it should really work on this lagging thing and I checked on myConnection it was perfectly fine it wasn‚Äôt laggy it had full Wi-Fi and I didn‚Äôt know what to do I wait in a long time for it to load I didn‚Äôt load only worked for some videos which wasn‚Äôt really my favorite so please fix this problem and I am I give it five stars thanks for reading this have a nice day

title: Disappointment
text:
You Tube has become just a format for the grandkids to watch, cute kitty videos and how to make DIY slime.  The real stuff, people posting videos backed up with statements, video, and bonafide articles, basically truth, are banned while you allow heads being chopped off, inaccurate information (proved inaccurate) and falsified information to continue to be posted. Your ‚Äúterms of conditions‚Äù is obviously politically motivated, unjust and one-sided. You view your watchers as idiots, unable to sort thru the muck of fact or fiction and be able to think for themselves.  As you continue to be a politically biased flat form, I would advise you to get a good grip on what your viewer‚Äôs opinions are as the tides are turning and people are getting tired of good people being banned while you promote a very incongruous platform.
I gave you 2 stars because the grandkids really like to watch Myna birds talking to each other.

title: Everything has gone wrong since the latest update!
text:
My problems with this app first started when I last updated it. It said it would fix an issue where search queries would disappear, but now the "Clear all history" icon is gone and I have to delete videos from my history one at a time. What happened to clearing the entire history?!You need to bring it back!! Also, the sound has now become very poorly synchronized with the videos themselves, AND the sound itself is way too slow and NOT how it should sound at ALL. YOU REALLY NEED TO FIX THIS APP AND UPDATE IT!! JUST BRING IT BACK TO NORMAL!! üò°

UPDATE: I‚Äôm having a serious problem where if you have more than 20 videos in a playlist, a bunch of them will disappear from the playlist! For example, if I have a playlist with 30 videos, ten of them will just disappear from the main playlist! I really don‚Äôt know how exactly to explain it, but it just happened to me today, and it‚Äôs driving me insane!! I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs some sort of glitch or what, but you REALLY need to fix that!!

title: Amazing

title: STOP TAKING DOWN SAFE CHANNELS.
text: so many channels many people love and enjoy are being taken down one after the other, despite them being completely safe, and all of their appeals are being rejected. the reason for all of them being for "promoting eating disorders," which is absolutely FALSE. instead of actually taking care of the thousands of channels that DO promote eating disorders, you take down the ones that do nothing wrong. they put so much hard work into their videos and worked so hard to grow their channels, and you wrongfully take their channels down and ruin all of their hard work. not just all of their subscribers are heartbroken that all of our favorite channels are being wrongfully taken down, the channel creators are crushed as well, especially since their appeals are all being rejected and all of their hard work and effort is GONE, despite them doing NOTHING wrong. why don't you take down the channels that actually break your rules instead of screwing over the ones that are safe??

title: I‚Äôve never had problems with this app before so I‚Äôm kinda disappointed
text: Just today I was listening to music on the app and out of no where the screen turns black but the music continued to play. I then click out of what I was listening to and restarted my phone, that helped fix that problem but then I went to my like list (I mostly have music on it for easy access). So I started listening to the music on my like list and whenever a video is done playing it atomically changes to the next video on my like list like it supposed to but whenever it goes to the next video my my list it freezes but still the audio continues to play. I left my like list think that it was what was causing the problem but this happens every time the app changes videos....... ugh please fix this.

title: YT Premium chokes at random. No fix from Google
text:
[23 Oct 2022] Continuing terrible performance on Premium account. The app just freezes a few seconds into each video, and needs to be restarted manually. See complaint details below. No fix or response from Google. App updates have not made any difference.  Perhaps this has something to do with iOS. Maybe the upcoming iOS 16.1 release will fix it. Let‚Äôs see. 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
[initial review] Until recently, this was an excellent app. Now it freezes arbitrarily, and won‚Äôt restart until I manually fidget with the play position, even on very fast networks. It‚Äôs not a problem with the device, either, this is an iPhone 14 Pro Max running the latest iOS. No other apps are having problems, it‚Äôs just YT Premium. Reinstalling the app hasn‚Äôt helped. I‚Äôve sent feedback a dozen times or more, but there‚Äôs been no fix or reply or mention of a workaround, even though updates have been issued. I hope this is addressed soon, so I can go back to giving this app five stars.

title: Paradigm shift
text:
I definitely recommend this app. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs in any way an understatement to say that this app has completely changed the entertainment landscape for better or worse. Many attempts have been made to imitate, copy or replicate the success of this app, all to no avail.  This app gives a voice to many humans who were figuratively dumb for all of the prior history of media. I don‚Äôt believe it‚Äôs an understatement to say this app is literally power for the powerless, hope for the  hopeless, faith for the faithless, strength for the weak, breakfast for the starving, and much much more. Other than the wide spread use of the internet itself, this app has had the most profound effect on society any Jeff could possibly imagine. 
   All that being said there are way too many adds on it now. I hate that there are adds within videos now. So much that I might stop using the app.

title: Fixing things that aren‚Äôt broken.
text:
First, it was the mini player, decent size, never took up much of the screen but wasn‚Äôt impossible to watch on, then they changed it. Now the mini player (when you swipe down on the video) is impossible to watch, and displays the title and uploader, as if we‚Äôre too stupid to remember what we‚Äôre watching.

And now, they‚Äôre at it again. Wanna see the comments on your video? Well, it‚Äôs right there, you just have to open it, and there‚Äôs one special guy who‚Äôs comment gets slapped on the face of the menu, how is this comment chosen? Who knows. What was the problem with the way the comment section looked? Now what we get is a tiny menu, and huge video suggestions under that, that just, kind of end. It‚Äôs jarring almost, you expect the scroll to be infinite, almost. The comments would keep going, now you get about 10 video suggestions, then they have to remind you that they moved the comment section. How about we leave that alone, and start working on treating your content creators well?

title: Horrible app, nearly useless. Use anything else.
text:
I start a video and put my phone down. If it sounds crazy cool, I pick my phone up to see, and there‚Äôs some feature of the app where touching your phone throws you to another video. 
That would be merely inconvenient, but there‚Äôs no back button and no history, so you‚Äôre never going to see what you picked your phone up to see. You might be able to search for it, if you remember the name. 
Also, when you‚Äôre watching and you want to back up 10 seconds to hear what they just said, you can‚Äôt. You touch the slide bar and it either goes forward or it goes back an hour. Or, it jumps to another video because your finger hit the phone somewhere. 
Don‚Äôt use this. Make them give us a back button and a 30 second rewind button.
